title: Prediction Cross-validation — Prediction_cross_validation

title: Prediction Cross-validation — Prediction_cross_validation
code: Prediction_cross_validation(   person,   k = 10,   threshold = 0,   disease,   method = "GWAS",   liabilities = person$FAM$Status )

title: Prediction Cross-validation — Prediction_cross_validation
text: person .rds file FBM.code256 accompanying FAM MAP. k Number folds used cross-validation. Default 10. threshold Vector P-values used thresholding. Default use thresholding. disease List properties disease. method Method use prediction. Possible methods "GWAS", "GWAX", "LTFH". Default "GWAS". liabilities Vector liabilities used prediction "LTFH" method. specified, uses "GWAS" method instead.

title: Prediction Cross-validation — Prediction_cross_validation
text: list 3 values: tibble average best scores threshold, best score, best model.

title: Simulation of a disease — sim_disease
text: function used simulate disease parameters.

title: Simulation of a disease — sim_disease
code: sim_disease(   n_snp,   prevalence,   h2,   causal = NULL,   causal_n = round(n_snp/10),   maf = NULL,   maf_low = 0.01,   maf_high = 0.49,   seed = NULL )

title: Simulation of a disease — sim_disease
text: n_snp Amount SNPs prevalence Prevalence disease simulated population h2 Herability parameter causal List predetermined causal SNPs. Leave empty get random causal SNPs. causal_n Amount causal SNPs. Default value 10 procent total SNPs maf List predetermined Minor Ale Frequency maf_low placeholder maf_high placeholder seed placeholder
